answers.answer: I agree completely! Kids are so hard sometimes! I can be in doing one thing and come out and have another room almost completely destroyed. Can grandma and grandpa or another family member take them for a fun sleep over? It could help you be able to get some cleaning done and maybe even catch a few extra zzzz's. Just a suggestion. Even a fun day date for them might be nice!
I wish. My parents are not that involved and live in Kansas.  I live in North Dakota.  And my husband's parents live 2 hours away .
Me too.. I'm being induced April 29th. So excited.
Was april 27 but dr changed it due to have to be 39 weeks laws.  Darn it lol. Oh well.
I'll be 39 weeks and 3 days on the 29th. I'm being induced because of gestational diabetes.
Having my first cs on the 29th and so can't wait to see my little girl. This is my 3rd pregancy. And my last.

I feel you! I'm 36 weeks been contracting so much lately and I'm dilated to a 1 already. But I'm going crazy nesting I want everything clean and perfect before he comes yet is so hard with a 6 and 7 year old. I went and stocked up on frozen food which I normally never buy because I'm so tired I just want to relax and not think about cooking but soon hopefully it will all be done

question: I'm getting excited . I only have exactly 3 weeks from today . April 30th. To be induced. All I want to do is have the whole house clean and laundry done and put away. Almost impossible due to the other kids trashing the house day in and out. Aghhhhh.
title: 3 weeks to go
